Email_001.Subject: Thinkin bout youu <3
Email_001.Body:
I can't stop thinking about last night's cam sesh.
    Did you get the money?
            
------------------------------------------------------------
To: DOUG KAUFMAN, From: ROXY REED
Subject: RE: Think bout youu <3
            
    Yea. Thnks 4 the tip. Want some new pics?
            
------------------------------------------------------------
To: ROXY REED, From: DOUG KAUFMAN
Subject: RE:RE: Thinkin bout youu <3
        
    Not right now. I think Katie is getting
    suspicious. I don't want her to get mad.
        
------------------------------------------------------------
To: DOUG KAUFMAN, From: ROXY REED
Subject: RE:RE: Thinkin bout youu <3
            
    She cant get mad if she doesnt know ;)

Email_002.Subject: Thank You For Your Donation!
Email_002.Body:
Mr. Kaufman,
            
    Thank you! We just received your generous
    $2000 donation to the Ricky Stewart
    Foundation, and it means the world to us. It's
    currently the largest donation we've ever
    received!
            
    I wanted to reach out to you personally to
    express my deepest gratitude. Because of you,
    we're one step closer to bringing Ricky's
    unfortunate death to justice. I'm so happy to
    know there are still some good people in this
    world.
            
    Sincerely,
            
    Veronica Stewart

Email_003.Subject: From the Desk of Dr. P. Howard
Email_003.Body:
Doug,
        
    I got your phone message this morning. I'm sorry to
    hear you feel this way. Remember what we talked 
    about - you need to confront your past, not run from it. 

    You never were a criminal, Doug. 
    Just because you got away, doesn't mean you're guilty. 
    
    Look at all the good you've done since then. I'd say 
    you  paid your debt to society. You've got a 
    great job, and a beautiful wife and daughter. 

    You can't change Ricky's death. But you can move on.

    Stay well,

    Dr. Perry Howard
    PhD Psychology
    Northern Peninsula Psychiatry
